    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Monstrosity Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=4760) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=583" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 135 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Untamed Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=4713)

</column>

---

You can transform into a powerful magical creature. Add the cave worm and sea serpent shapes listed in [_monstrosity form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1608) to your untamed form list. If you have [Soaring Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=4739), also add the phoenix shape to your untamed form list.
